description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Imagine retro-gaming on steroids! 500 balls on-screen simultaneously; multiple power-ups; and directional control over your bat! Play against a friend or take on the CPU controlled opponent.
description.short: Imagine retro-gaming on steroids! 500 balls on-screen simultaneously; multiple power-ups; and directional control over your bat! Play against a friend or take on the CPU controlled opponent.
